briefTitle: A Phase III Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Entecavir in Pediatric Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B Virus Infection
officialTitle: A Comparative Study of the Antiviral Efficacy and Safety of Entecavir (ETV) Versus Placebo in Pediatric Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) Infection Who Are HBeAg-Positive
summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of entecavir in pediatric patients with chronic hepatitis B virus infection

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved a Combination of Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) DNA Suppression and Hepatitis B e Antigen (HBeAg) Seroconversion at Week 48
